item.title: Mad About You
item.description: Feel the vibe Feel the terror Feel the pain It’s driving me insane I can’t fake For God’s sake why am I driving in the wrong lane Trouble is my middle name But in the end I’m not too bad Can someone tell me if it’s wrong to be so mad about you Mad about you Mad Are you the fishy wine who will give me a headache in the morning
